languages.text: "Безумие. Отчаяние. Или веление извращенной творческой искры. Каждый гемункул мнит себя художником — быть может, его очередной "замысел" требовал отдать себя на ужин Сай'лантреш".

"Insanity. Desperation. Or the compulsion of twisted creative genius. Every Haemonculus thinks of themselves as an artist — perhaps his next 'design' required him to serve himself up to Sai'lanthresh on a platter."
languages.original_text: "Безумие. Отчаяние. Или веление извращенной творческой искры. Каждый гемункул мнит себя художником — быть может, его очередной "замысел" требовал отдать себя на ужин Сай'лантреш".

traits.locale_text: "Insanity. Desperation. Or the compulsion of twisted creative genius. Every Haemonculus thinks of themselves as an artist — perhaps his next 'design' required him to serve himself up to Sai'lanthresh on a platter."

"Insanity. Desperation. Or the compulsion of twisted creative genius. Every Haemonculus thinks of themselves as an artist — perhaps his next 'design' required him to serve himself up to Sai'lanthresh on a platter."

"Insanity. Desperation. Or the compulsion of twisted creative genius. Every Haemonculus thinks of themselves as an artist — perhaps his next 'design' required him to serve himself up to Sai'lanthresh on a platter."

"Insanity. Desperation. Or the compulsion of twisted creative genius. Every Haemonculus thinks of themselves as an artist — perhaps his next 'design' required him to serve himself up to Sai'lanthresh on a platter."

languages.text: “出于疯狂，或是出于绝望，又或许是邪恶天才的强迫症。每个血伶人都认为自己是艺术家，或许他下一件‘作品’，就是要把他自己装在盘子里，送到赛·兰斯雷什的嘴里。”
languages.original_text: "Insanity. Desperation. Or the compulsion of twisted creative genius. Every Haemonculus thinks of themselves as an artist — perhaps his next 'design' required him to serve himself up to Sai'lanthresh on a platter."

traits.locale_text: “出于疯狂，或是出于绝望，又或许是邪恶天才的强迫症。每个血伶人都认为自己是艺术家，或许他下一件‘作品’，就是要把他自己装在盘子里，送到赛·兰斯雷什的嘴里。”

languages.text: « La folie. Le désespoir. Ou la pulsion d'un génie créatif fantasque. Tous les hémoncules se voient comme des artistes. Peut-être que sa nouvelle œuvre nécessitait qu'il se donne en pâture à Sai'lanthresh. »
languages.original_text: "Insanity. Desperation. Or the compulsion of twisted creative genius. Every Haemonculus thinks of themselves as an artist — perhaps his next 'design' required him to serve himself up to Sai'lanthresh on a platter."

traits.locale_text: « La folie. Le désespoir. Ou la pulsion d'un génie créatif fantasque. Tous les hémoncules se voient comme des artistes. Peut-être que sa nouvelle œuvre nécessitait qu'il se donne en pâture à Sai'lanthresh. »

languages.text: «Locura. Desesperación. O tal vez los arrebatos de una genialidad creativa desbocada. Todo Hemónculo se considera un artista. A lo mejor su siguiente "obra maestra" pasaba por ofrecerse a Sai'lanthresh en bandeja».
languages.original_text: "Insanity. Desperation. Or the compulsion of twisted creative genius. Every Haemonculus thinks of themselves as an artist — perhaps his next 'design' required him to serve himself up to Sai'lanthresh on a platter."

traits.locale_text: «Locura. Desesperación. O tal vez los arrebatos de una genialidad creativa desbocada. Todo Hemónculo se considera un artista. A lo mejor su siguiente "obra maestra" pasaba por ofrecerse a Sai'lanthresh en bandeja».

languages.text: 「狂気か。絶望か。あるいはゆがんだ創造性が生んだ衝動か。ハモンキュラスの考えはすべてが芸術家のそれだ…奴の次なる”設計”に必要だったのは、セランスレッシュに捧げる皿にのった自分だったんだろう」
languages.original_text: "Insanity. Desperation. Or the compulsion of twisted creative genius. Every Haemonculus thinks of themselves as an artist — perhaps his next 'design' required him to serve himself up to Sai'lanthresh on a platter."

traits.locale_text: 「狂気か。絶望か。あるいはゆがんだ創造性が生んだ衝動か。ハモンキュラスの考えはすべてが芸術家のそれだ…奴の次なる”設計”に必要だったのは、セランスレッシュに捧げる皿にのった自分だったんだろう」

languages.text: "Wahnsinn. Verzweiflung. Oder das zwanghafte Verhalten eines pervertierten kreativen Genies. Jeder Haemonculus hält sich für einen Künstler. Vielleicht war es für sein nächstes 'Werk' nötig, dass er sich selbst Sai'lanthresh auf einem Silbertablett serviert."
languages.original_text: "Insanity. Desperation. Or the compulsion of twisted creative genius. Every Haemonculus thinks of themselves as an artist — perhaps his next 'design' required him to serve himself up to Sai'lanthresh on a platter."

traits.locale_text: "Wahnsinn. Verzweiflung. Oder das zwanghafte Verhalten eines pervertierten kreativen Genies. Jeder Haemonculus hält sich für einen Künstler. Vielleicht war es für sein nächstes 'Werk' nötig, dass er sich selbst Sai'lanthresh auf einem Silbertablett serviert."

languages.original_text: "Insanity. Desperation. Or the compulsion of twisted creative genius. Every Haemonculus thinks of themselves as an artist — perhaps his next 'design' required him to serve himself up to Sai'lanthresh on a platter."

languages.text: "Delilik. Çaresizlik. Belki de çarpık bir yaratıcı dehanın baskısı. Her bir Haimonkulus kendini sanatçı olarak görür. Belki sıradaki 'tasarımı', Sai'lanthresh'e kendini sunmasını gerektirmiştir."
languages.original_text: "Insanity. Desperation. Or the compulsion of twisted creative genius. Every Haemonculus thinks of themselves as an artist — perhaps his next 'design' required him to serve himself up to Sai'lanthresh on a platter."

traits.locale_text: "Delilik. Çaresizlik. Ya da çarpık bir yaratıcı zekânın baskısı. Her bir Haimonkulus kendini sanatçı olarak görür. Belki sıradaki 'tasarımı', Sai'lanthresh'e kendini sunmasını gerektirmiştir."
